text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He has been the Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry since December 2023. He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2009. Saitō was the Minister of Justice from November 2022 to September 2023. He was the Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries from August 2017 to October 2018. In August 2024, Saitō said that he was interested in running for the Liberal Democratic Party in the 2024 leadership election. However a month later, he declined to run after not being able to get enough support. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of justice of Japan Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan Category:Ministers of economy, trade and industry of Japan
title: Ken Saitō
